## IStringBufferOutputOptions interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IStringBufferOutputOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [normalizeSpecialCharacters](./node-core-library.istringbufferoutputoptions.normalizespecialcharacters.md) | boolean | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> If set to true, special characters like \\ n, \\ r, and the \\ u001b character in color control tokens will get normalized to \[-n-\], \[-r-\], and \[-x-\] respectively This option defaults to <code>true</code> |
